soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.START_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: SOAR enables security teams to automate response to threats. SOAR does this by ingesting, grouping and prioritizing alerts from all your detection tools to automatically execute playbooks and coordinate a hands-on response.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Define artefacts to exclude from enrichment, ensuring specific IPs, URLs, Domains, Files, Ports, and CIDR ranges are ignored in further analysis.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_IP_ADDRESS_TOOLTIP: Enter the IP addresses that you want to exclude from enrichment.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_URL_TOOLTIP: Enter the URLs that you want to exclude from enrichment.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_DOMAIN_TOOLTIP: Enter the Domains that you want to exclude from enrichment.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_PORTS_TOOLTIP: Enter the Ports that you want to exclude from enrichment.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_FILES_TOOLTIP: Enter the Files that you want to exclude from enrichment.
soarFrameworkConfigurationWizard.SECOND_PAGE_CIDR_TOOLTIP: Enter the CIDR ranges that you want to exclude from enrichment.
